scripts.functions:deploy: npx supabase functions deploy chat --no-verify-jwt && npx supabase functions deploy config --no-verify-jwt
scripts.functions:deploy:prod: node scripts/confirm-prod.js npx supabase functions deploy chat --no-verify-jwt --project-ref rukppthsduuvsfjynfmw && node scripts/confirm-prod.js npx supabase functions deploy config --no-verify-jwt --project-ref rukppthsduuvsfjynfmw
scripts.widget:deploy: npx supabase storage rm ss:///widget/chat-widget.js --experimental --yes & npx supabase storage cp widget/chat-widget.js ss:///widget/chat-widget.js --experimental
